name: ListGroupPushMappings
description:
Retrieve a list of group push mappings for a specific app.

This tool is used to list all group push mappings for a specific app, identified by the app ID, with support for pagination if there are many mappings.

parameters.name: application_id
parameters.description: The ID of the application to filter group push mappings for.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for retrieving the next page of group push mappings.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of mappings

parameters.name: results_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of group push mappings to return in the response. Useful for pagination to limit the number of items retrieved per request.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results returned

parameters.name: filter_by_last_updated_date
parameters.description: Filters mappings updated on or after the specified date and time in UTC. Use `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ` format.

value_schema.description:
Filters group push mappings by last updated date. The `lastUpdated` parameter supports the following format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ`. This filters mappings updated on or after the specified date and time in UTC.

If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

parameters.name: source_group_id
parameters.description: Filters group push mappings by source group ID. When omitted, returns all mappings.

value_schema.description: Filters group push mappings by source group ID. If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

parameters.name: filter_by_status
parameters.description: Filters group push mappings by status. Valid options include 'ACTIVE', 'ERROR', 'INACTIVE'. If omitted, all statuses are included.

value_schema.description: Filters group push mappings by status. If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of mappings

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of mappings

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results returned

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results returned

parameters.name: lastUpdated
parameters.description:
Filters group push mappings by last updated date. The `lastUpdated` parameter supports the following format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ`. This filters mappings updated on or after the specified date and time in UTC.

If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

value_schema.description:
Filters group push mappings by last updated date. The `lastUpdated` parameter supports the following format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ`. This filters mappings updated on or after the specified date and time in UTC.

If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

parameters.name: sourceGroupId
parameters.description: Filters group push mappings by source group ID. If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

value_schema.description: Filters group push mappings by source group ID. If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filters group push mappings by status. If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

value_schema.description: Filters group push mappings by status. If you don't specify a value, all group push mappings are returned.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
